queries.description: A function identifier should only be called with a parenthesized parameter list or used with a & (address-of).
queries.name: A function identifier should only be called with a parenthesized parameter list or used with a &

RULE-17-12.title: A function identifier should only be called with a parenthesized parameter list or used with a & (address-of)

queries.description: The behavior of type qualifiers on a function type is undefined.
queries.name: A function type shall not include any type qualifiers (const, volatile, restrict, or _Atomic)

RULE-17-13.title: A function type shall not include any type qualifiers (const, volatile, restrict, or _Atomic)
